channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: Located along historic Route 6
item.description: Located along historic Route 66 in Flagstaff, you'll find one of the oldest bowling alleys in Arizona.

item.title: Waymo has announced that it is
item.description: Waymo has announced that it is further expanding rides to and from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport.

item.title: A new report indicates Latinas
item.description: A new report indicates Latinas in the U.S. contributed more than $1.3 trillion in gross domestic product in 2021, representing 50% growth over a decade.
